feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 9:01AM AKST until December 22 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Bristol Bay.

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 9:01AM AKST until December 22 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch, mainly south and west of Sleetmute. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 22 at 5:31AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...A LIGHT WINTRY MIX OF PRECIPITATION POSSIBLE SOUTH OF KENAI WEDNESDAY... Light wintry precipitation is expected to overspread the western Kenai Peninsula Wednesday morning as a frontal system advances from the west. As the front moves east, an area of warmer air aloft will move across southern Cook Inlet and the western Kenai

entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER WILL RESULT IN MAJOR TRAVEL DISRUPTIONS THROUGH THE HOLIDAY WEEKEND... entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 2:35AM PST until December 22 at 9:00PM PST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Multiple Winter Storms to Impact Holiday Mountain Travel through the Weekend... .A series of winter storms will bring multiple rounds of mountain snow and gusty winds through Sunday.
